picked_headlines.summary: SCOUT is a lightweight tool for efficient scenario coverage assessment in autonomous driving, reducing costs and improving scalability.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: SCOUT offers practical solutions for the automotive industry, appealing to both engineers and management by addressing cost efficiency and scalability in autonomous driving.

picked_headlines.summary: A guide for engineering leaders on effectively integrating AI in teams, emphasizing strategy, measurement, and psychological safety.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides valuable insights for engineering leaders, focusing on strategic AI integration and fostering a safe environment for innovation.

digest:
- *FT-ARM* enhances pressure ulcer classification with multimodal AI, improving accuracy and interpretability through reflective reasoning. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24980*
- *Plexus* introduces a 3D parallel approach for training GNNs on billion-edge graphs, achieving significant speedups and improved load balancing. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04083*
- *Data-Juicer 2.0* enhances data processing for foundation models, offering efficient multimodal support and improved usability across platforms. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2501.14755*
- *OpenGuardrails* is an open-source platform enhancing LLM safety with configurable policies and unified detection for content and manipulation risks. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.19169*
- *BugPilot* introduces a novel method for generating realistic bugs, enhancing training efficiency for software engineering agents. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.19898*
- *FaRAccel* is an FPGA-based architecture enhancing Transformer models' resilience against Bit-Flip Attacks with optimized performance and energy efficiency. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24985*
- *TempoPFN* introduces a linear RNN model for zero-shot time series forecasting, outperforming existing methods with efficient synthetic data training. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25502*
- *GAP* enhances tool use in AI agents by enabling parallel execution of tasks, improving efficiency and accuracy over traditional methods. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25320*
- *UrduFactCheck* introduces a fact-checking framework and benchmarks for Urdu, addressing LLM reliability in low-resource languages. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.15063*
- *EHR-R1* enhances EHR analysis with a reasoning-driven model and dataset, outperforming existing LLMs in clinical tasks. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25628*
- *Agentic Moderation* enhances safety in vision-language models using dynamic agents, improving task coordination and reducing attack success rates. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25179*
- *FARSIQA* is an advanced RAG system for Islamic QA, enhancing accuracy and trustworthiness for Persian speakers through iterative refinement. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.25621*
